title: BitcoinorEth2
author: BitcoinorEth2
content: Dear Bitcointalkers,I am really struggling to find people for a survey for my university studies. It is about investment motivation - mostly Bitcoin and Ethereum. It takes just 3 minutes to fill it out and it would help me more than you could ever know if you could fill it out - there is also a small giveaway.. So if you wanna do a good deed - here is the link: https://www.surveymonkey.de/r/2KR5JF3 . Thank you already so much for regarding  I am really struggling to meet the deadline haha.

comments.author: B1-66ER
comments.body: God said, never flippingRequirements engineering (RE) done.
